A.name: accent-color
A.brief: Specifies an accent color for user-interface controls

A.name: align-content
A.brief: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

A.name: align-items
A.brief: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container

A.name: align-self
A.brief: Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container

A.name: all
A.brief: Resets all properties (except unicode-bidi and direction)

A.name: animation
A.brief: A shorthand property for all the animation-* properties

A.name: animation-delay
A.brief: Specifies a delay for the start of an animation

A.name: animation-direction
A.brief:
Specifies whether an animation should be played forward, backward or 
    in alternate cycles

A.name: animation-duration
A.brief: Specifies how long an animation should take to complete one cycle

A.name: animation-fill-mode
A.brief:
Specifies a style for the element when the animation is not playing (before 
    it starts, after it ends, or both)

A.name: animation-iteration-count
A.brief: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played

A.name: animation-name
A.brief: Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation

A.name: animation-play-state
A.brief: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused

A.name: animation-timing-function
A.brief: Specifies the speed curve of an animation

A.name: aspect-ratio
A.brief: Specifies preferred aspect ratio of an element

B.name: backdrop-filter
B.brief: Defines a graphical effect to the area behind an element

B.name: backface-visibility
B.brief: Defines whether or not the back face of an element should be visible when facing the user

B.name: background
B.brief: A shorthand property for all the background-* properties

B.name: background-attachment
B.brief: Sets whether a background image scrolls with the rest of the page, or is fixed

B.name: background-blend-mode
B.brief: Specifies the blending mode of each background layer (color/image)

B.name: background-clip
B.brief:
Defines how far the background (color or image) should extend within an 
    element

B.name: background-color
B.brief: Specifies the background color of an element

B.name: background-image
B.brief: Specifies one or more background images for an element

B.name: background-origin
B.brief: Specifies the origin position of a background image

B.name: background-position
B.brief: Specifies the position of a background image

B.name: background-position-x
B.brief: Specifies the position of a background image on x-axis

B.name: background-position-y
B.brief: Specifies the position of a background image on y-axis

B.name: background-repeat
B.brief: Sets if/how a background image will be repeated

B.name: background-size
B.brief: Specifies the size of the background images

B.name: block-size
B.brief: Specifies the size of an element in block direction

B.name: border
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-width, border-style and border-color

B.name: border-block
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-block-width, border-block-style and border-block-color

B.name: border-block-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the block direction

B.name: border-block-end
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-block-end-width, border-block-end-style and border-block-end-color

B.name: border-block-end-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the border at the end in the block direction

B.name: border-block-end-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the border at the end in the block direction

B.name: border-block-end-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the border at the end in the block direction

B.name: border-block-start
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-block-start-width, border-block-start-style and border-block-start-color

B.name: border-block-start-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the border at the start in the block direction

B.name: border-block-start-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the border at the start in the block direction

B.name: border-block-start-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the border at the start in the block direction

B.name: border-block-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the borders at start and end in the block direction

B.name: border-block-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the borders at start and end in the block direction

B.name: border-bottom
B.brief:
A shorthand property for border-bottom-width, border-bottom-style 
    and border-bottom-color

B.name: border-bottom-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the bottom border

B.name: border-bottom-left-radius
B.brief: Defines the radius of the border of the bottom-left corner

B.name: border-bottom-right-radius
B.brief: Defines the radius of the border of the bottom-right corner

B.name: border-bottom-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the bottom border

B.name: border-bottom-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the bottom border

B.name: border-collapse
B.brief: Sets whether table borders should collapse into a single border or be separated

B.name: border-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the four borders

B.name: border-end-end-radius
B.brief:
Sets the radius of the corner between the block-end and the inline-end 
    sides of the element

B.name: border-end-start-radius
B.brief:
Sets the radius of the corner between the block-end and the inline-start 
    sides of the element

B.name: border-image
B.brief: A shorthand property for all the border-image-* properties

B.name: border-image-outset
B.brief: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

B.name: border-image-repeat
B.brief: Specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched

B.name: border-image-slice
B.brief: Specifies how to slice the border image

B.name: border-image-source
B.brief: Specifies the path to the image to be used as a border

B.name: border-image-width
B.brief: Specifies the width of the border image

B.name: border-inline
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-inline-width, border-inline-style and border-inline-color

B.name: border-inline-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-end
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-inline-end-width, border-inline-end-style and border-inline-end-color

B.name: border-inline-end-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the border at the end in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-end-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the border at the end in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-end-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the border at the end in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-start
B.brief: A shorthand property for border-inline-start-width, border-inline-start-style and border-inline-start-color

B.name: border-inline-start-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the border at the start in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-start-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the border at the start in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-start-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the border at the start in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the borders at start and end in the inline direction

B.name: border-inline-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the borders at start and end in the inline direction

B.name: border-left
B.brief: A shorthand property for all the border-left-* properties

B.name: border-left-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the left border

B.name: border-left-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the left border

B.name: border-left-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the left border

B.name: border-radius
B.brief: A shorthand property for the four border-*-radius properties

B.name: border-right
B.brief: A shorthand property for all the border-right-* properties

B.name: border-right-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the right border

B.name: border-right-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the right border

B.name: border-right-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the right border

B.name: border-spacing
B.brief: Sets the distance between the borders of adjacent cells

B.name: border-start-end-radius
B.brief:
Sets the radius of the corner between the block-start and the inline-end 
    sides of the element

B.name: border-start-start-radius
B.brief:
Sets the radius of the corner between the block-start and the inline-start 
    sides of the element

B.name: border-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the four borders

B.name: border-top
B.brief:
A shorthand property for border-top-width, border-top-style and
    border-top-color

B.name: border-top-color
B.brief: Sets the color of the top border

B.name: border-top-left-radius
B.brief: Defines the radius of the border of the top-left corner

B.name: border-top-right-radius
B.brief: Defines the radius of the border of the top-right corner

B.name: border-top-style
B.brief: Sets the style of the top border

B.name: border-top-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the top border

B.name: border-width
B.brief: Sets the width of the four borders

B.name: bottom
B.brief: Sets the elements position, from the bottom of its parent element

B.name: box-decoration-break
B.brief: Sets the behavior of the background and border of an element at page-break, or, for  in-line elements, at line-break.

B.name: box-reflect
B.brief: The box-reflect property is used to create a reflection of an element.

B.name: box-shadow
B.brief: Attaches one or more shadows to an element

B.name: box-sizing
B.brief:
Defines how the width and height of an element are calculated: should 
    they include padding and borders, or not

B.name: break-after
B.brief:
Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur 
    after the specified element

B.name: break-before
B.brief:
Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur 
    before the specified element

B.name: break-inside
B.brief:
Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur 
    inside the specified element

C.name: caption-side
C.brief: Specifies the placement of a table caption

C.name: caret-color
C.brief:
Specifies the color of the cursor (caret) in inputs, textareas, or any 
    element that is editable

C.name: clear
C.brief:
Specifies what should happen with the element that is next to a floating 
    element

C.name: clip
C.brief: Deprecated in favor of clip-path. Clips an absolutely positioned element

C.name: clip-path
C.brief: Clips an element to a basic shape or to an SVG source

C.name: color
C.brief: Sets the color of text

C.name: color-scheme
C.brief:
Indicates which operating system color scheme an element should render 
    with

C.name: column-count
C.brief: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into

C.name: column-fill
C.brief: Specifies how to fill columns, balanced or not

C.name: column-gap
C.brief: Specifies the gap between the columns

C.name: column-rule
C.brief: A shorthand property for all the column-rule-* properties

C.name: column-rule-color
C.brief: Specifies the color of the rule between columns

C.name: column-rule-style
C.brief: Specifies the style of the rule between columns

C.name: column-rule-width
C.brief: Specifies the width of the rule between columns

C.name: column-span
C.brief: Specifies how many columns an element should span across

C.name: column-width
C.brief: Specifies the column width

C.name: columns
C.brief: A shorthand property for column-width and column-count

C.name: content
C.brief: Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements, to insert generated content

C.name: counter-increment
C.brief: Increases or decreases the value of one or more CSS counters

C.name: counter-reset
C.brief: Creates or resets one or more CSS counters

C.name: counter-set
C.brief: Creates or sets one or more CSS counters

C.name: cursor
C.brief: Specifies the mouse cursor to be displayed when pointing over an element

@.name: @charset
@.brief: Specifies the character encoding used in the style sheet

@.name: @container
@.brief:
Define styles for elements in container, depending on the container's 
    size or style

@.name: @counter-style
@.brief: Lets you define your own counter styles

@.name: @font-face
@.brief: Specifies a custom font to use to display text

@.name: @font-palette-values
@.brief: Allows you to customize the default values of a font-palette

@.name: @import
@.brief: Allows you to import a style sheet into another style sheet

@.name: @keyframes
@.brief:
Controls the steps in an animation by defining styles for points along 
    the animation sequence

@.name: @layer
@.brief: Controls how the CSS cascade layers evaluates the order of styles

@.name: @media
@.brief: Sets the style rules for different media types/devices/sizes

@.name: @namespace
@.brief: Defines an XML namespace to be used in the style sheet

@.name: @page
@.brief: Customizes the dimension, orientation, and margins of printed pages

@.name: @property
@.brief: Defines custom CSS properties directly in the stylesheet without having to run any JavaScript

@.name: @scope
@.brief:
Allows you to select elements in specific DOM subtrees and target 
    elements precisely without writing overly-specific selectors

@.name: @starting-style
@.brief:
Defines an element's starting styles before the element gets its first 
    style update

@.name: @supports
@.brief: Used to test whether a browser supports a CSS feature

D.name: display
D.brief: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

E.name: empty-cells
E.brief: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table

F.name: filter
F.brief: Defines effects (e.g. blurring or color shifting) on an element before the element is displayed

F.name: flex
F.brief:
A shorthand property for the flex-grow, flex-shrink, and the 
    flex-basis 
    properties

F.name: flex-basis
F.brief: Specifies the initial length of a flexible item

F.name: flex-direction
F.brief: Specifies the direction of the flexible items

F.name: flex-flow
F.brief: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties

F.name: flex-grow
F.brief: Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest

F.name: flex-shrink
F.brief: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest

F.name: flex-wrap
F.brief: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not

F.name: float
F.brief:
Specifies whether an element should float to the left, right, or not at 
    all

F.name: font
F.brief:
A shorthand property for the font-style, font-variant, font-weight, 
    font-size/line-height, and the font-family properties

F.name: font-family
F.brief: Specifies the font family for text

F.name: font-feature-settings
F.brief: Allows control over advanced typographic features in OpenType fonts

F.name: font-kerning
F.brief: Controls the usage of the kerning information (how letters are spaced)

F.name: font-size
F.brief: Specifies the font size of text

F.name: font-size-adjust
F.brief: Preserves the readability and size of text when fallback font occurs

F.name: font-stretch
F.brief: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family

F.name: font-style
F.brief: Specifies the font style for text

F.name: font-variant
F.brief: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font

F.name: font-variant-caps
F.brief: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for capital letters

F.name: font-weight
F.brief: Specifies the weight of a font

G.name: gap
G.brief: A shorthand property for the row-gap and the column-gap properties

G.name: grid
G.brief:
A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, 
    grid-template-columns, grid-template-areas, grid-auto-rows, 
    grid-auto-columns, and the grid-auto-flow properties

G.name: grid-area
G.brief: Either specifies a name for the grid item, or this property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end, and grid-column-end properties

G.name: grid-auto-flow
G.brief: Specifies how auto-placed items are inserted in the grid

G.name: grid-column
G.brief: A shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties

G.name: grid-column-end
G.brief: Specifies where to end the grid item

G.name: grid-column-start
G.brief: Specifies where to start the grid item

G.name: grid-row
G.brief: A shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties

G.name: grid-row-end
G.brief: Specifies where to end the grid item

G.name: grid-row-start
G.brief: Specifies where to start the grid item

G.name: grid-template
G.brief:
A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns 
    and grid-areas properties

G.name: grid-template-areas
G.brief: Specifies how to display columns and rows, using named grid items

G.name: grid-template-columns
G.brief: Specifies the size of the columns, and how many columns in a grid layout

G.name: grid-template-rows
G.brief: Specifies the size of the rows in a grid layout

H.name: hanging-punctuation
H.brief: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box

H.name: height
H.brief: Sets the height of an element

H.name: hyphens
H.brief: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of text

H.name: hypenate-character
H.brief: Sets the character used at the end of line, before a hyphenation break

I.name: image-rendering
I.brief: Specifies the type of algorithm to use for image scaling

I.name: initial-letter
I.brief:
Specifies the size of the initial-letter and optionally the number of 
    lines the initial letter should sink (down in the text)

I.name: inline-size
I.brief: Specifies the size of an element in the inline direction

I.name: inset
I.brief: Specifies the distance between an element and the parent element

I.name: inset-block
I.brief: Specifies the distance between an element and the parent element in the block direction

I.name: inset-block-end
I.brief: Specifies the distance between the end of an element and the parent element in the block direction

I.name: inset-block-start
I.brief: Specifies the distance between the start of an element and the parent element in the block direction

I.name: inset-inline
I.brief: Specifies the distance between an element and the parent element in the inline direction

I.name: inset-inline-end
I.brief: Specifies the distance between the end of an element and the parent element in the inline direction

I.name: inset-inline-start
I.brief: Specifies the distance between the start of an element and the parent element in the inline direction

I.name: isolation
I.brief: Defines whether an element must create a new stacking content

J.name: justify-content
J.brief: Specifies the alignment between the items inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

J.name: justify-items
J.brief: Is set on the grid container. Specifies the alignment of grid items in the inline direction

J.name: justify-self
J.brief: Is set on the grid item. Specifies the alignment of the grid item in the inline direction

L.name: left
L.brief: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

L.name: letter-spacing
L.brief: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

L.name: list-style
L.brief: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration

L.name: list-style-image
L.brief: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

L.name: list-style-position
L.brief: Specifies the position of the list-item markers (bullet points)

L.name: list-style-type
L.brief: Specifies the type of list-item marker

M.name: margin
M.brief: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration

M.name: margin-block
M.brief: Specifies the margin in the block direction

M.name: margin-block-end
M.brief: Specifies the margin at the end in the block direction

M.name: margin-block-start
M.brief: Specifies the margin at the start in the block direction

M.name: margin-bottom
M.brief: Sets the bottom margin of an element

M.name: margin-inline
M.brief: Specifies the margin in the inline direction

M.name: margin-inline-end
M.brief: Specifies the margin at the end in the inline direction

M.name: margin-inline-start
M.brief: Specifies the margin at the start in the inline direction

M.name: margin-left
M.brief: Sets the left margin of an element

M.name: margin-right
M.brief: Sets the right margin of an element

M.name: margin-top
M.brief: Sets the top margin of an element

M.name: marker
M.brief:
Points to a marker that will be drawn on all vertices of an element's 
    path (the first, middle, and last)

M.name: marker-end
M.brief:
Points to a marker that will be drawn on the last vertex of an element's 
    path

M.name: marker-mid
M.brief:
Points to a marker that will be drawn on all the middle vertices of an 
    element's path

M.name: marker-start
M.brief:
Points to a marker that will be drawn on the first vertex of an 
    element's path

M.name: mask
M.brief:
A shorthand property for mask-image, mask-mode, 
    mask-repeat, mask-position, mask-clip, mask-origin,
    mask-size and mask-composite

M.name: mask-clip
M.brief: Specifies which area is affected by a mask image

M.name: mask-composite
M.brief:
Specifies a compositing operation used on the current mask layer with 
    the mask layers below it

M.name: mask-image
M.brief: Specifies an image to be used as a mask layer for an element

M.name: mask-mode
M.brief:
Specifies whether the mask layer image is treated as a luminance mask or 
    as an alpha mask

M.name: mask-origin
M.brief: Specifies the origin position (the mask position area) of a mask layer image

M.name: mask-position
M.brief:
Sets the starting position of a mask layer image (relative to the 
    mask position area)

M.name: mask-repeat
M.brief: Specifies how the mask layer image is repeated

M.name: mask-size
M.brief: Specifies the size of a mask layer image

M.name: mask-type
M.brief:
Specifies whether an SVG <mask> element is treated as a luminance 
    mask or as an alpha mask

M.name: max-height
M.brief: Sets the maximum height of an element

M.name: max-width
M.brief: Sets the maximum width of an element

M.name: max-block-size
M.brief: Sets the maximum size of an element in the block direction

M.name: max-inline-size
M.brief: Sets the maximum size of an element in the inline direction

M.name: min-block-size
M.brief: Sets the minimum size of an element in the block direction

M.name: min-inline-size
M.brief: Sets the minimum size of an element in the inline direction

M.name: min-height
M.brief: Sets the minimum height of an element

M.name: min-width
M.brief: Sets the minimum width of an element

M.name: mix-blend-mode
M.brief: Specifies how an element's content should blend with its direct parent background

O.name: object-fit
O.brief: Specifies how the contents of a replaced element should be fitted to the box established by its used height and width

O.name: object-position
O.brief: Specifies the alignment of the replaced element inside its box

O.name: offset
O.brief:
A shorthand property for the offset-anchor, offset-distance,
    offset-path, offset-position, and the offset-rotate 
    properties

O.name: offset-anchor
O.brief: Specifies a point on an element that is fixed to the path it is animated along

O.name: offset-distance
O.brief: Specifies the position along a path where an animated element is placed

O.name: offset-path
O.brief: Specifies the path an element is animated along

O.name: offset-position
O.brief: Specifies the initial position of an element along a path

O.name: offset-rotate
O.brief: Specifies rotation of an element as it is animated along a path

O.name: opacity
O.brief: Sets the opacity level for an element

O.name: order
O.brief: Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest

O.name: orphans
O.brief:
Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a 
    page or column

O.name: outline
O.brief:
A shorthand property for the outline-width, outline-style, and 
    the outline-color properties

O.name: outline-color
O.brief: Sets the color of an outline

O.name: outline-offset
O.brief: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge

O.name: outline-style
O.brief: Sets the style of an outline

O.name: outline-width
O.brief: Sets the width of an outline

O.name: overflow
O.brief: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box

O.name: overflow-anchor
O.brief: Specifies whether or not content in viewable area in a scrollable contianer should be pushed down when new content is loaded above

O.name: overflow-wrap
O.brief:
Specifies whether or not the browser can break lines with long words, if 
    they overflow the container

O.name: overflow-x
O.brief: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

O.name: overflow-y
O.brief: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

O.name: overscroll-behavior
O.brief: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in x- and y-directions

O.name: overscroll-behavior-block
O.brief: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in the block direction

O.name: overscroll-behavior-inline
O.brief: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in the inline direction

O.name: overscroll-behavior-x
O.brief: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in x-direction

O.name: overscroll-behavior-y
O.brief: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in y-directions

P.name: padding
P.brief: A shorthand property for all the padding-* properties

P.name: padding-block
P.brief: Specifies the padding in the block direction

P.name: padding-block-end
P.brief: Specifies the padding at the end in the block direction

P.name: padding-block-start
P.brief: Specifies the padding at the start in the block direction

P.name: padding-bottom
P.brief: Sets the bottom padding of an element

P.name: padding-inline
P.brief: Specifies the padding in the inline direction

P.name: padding-inline-end
P.brief: Specifies the padding at the end in the inline direction

P.name: padding-inline-start
P.brief: Specifies the padding at the start in the inline direction

P.name: padding-left
P.brief: Sets the left padding of an element

P.name: padding-right
P.brief: Sets the right padding of an element

P.name: padding-top
P.brief: Sets the top padding of an element

P.name: page-break-after
P.brief: Sets the page-break behavior after an element. Replaced by break-after property

P.name: page-break-before
P.brief: Sets the page-break behavior before an element. Replaced by break-before property

P.name: page-break-inside
P.brief: Sets the page-break behavior inside an element. Replaced by break-inside property

P.name: paint-order
P.brief: Sets the order of how an SVG element or text is painted.

P.name: perspective
P.brief: Gives a 3D-positioned element some perspective

P.name: perspective-origin
P.brief: Defines at which position the user is looking at the 3D-positioned element

P.name: place-content
P.brief: Specifies align-content and justify-content property values for flexbox and grid layouts

P.name: place-items
P.brief: Specifies align-items and justify-items property values for grid layouts

P.name: place-self
P.brief: Specifies align-self and justify-self property values for grid layouts

P.name: pointer-events
P.brief: Defines whether or not an element reacts to pointer events

P.name: position
P.brief: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

Q.name: quotes
Q.brief: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations

R.name: resize
R.brief: Defines if (and how) an element is resizable by the user

R.name: right
R.brief: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

R.name: rotate
R.brief: Specifies the rotation of an element

R.name: row-gap
R.brief: Specifies the gap between the grid rows

S.name: scale
S.brief: Specifies the size of an element by scaling up or down

S.name: scroll-behavior
S.brief: Specifies whether to smoothly animate the scroll position in a scrollable box, instead of a straight jump

S.name: scroll-margin
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position and the container

S.name: scroll-margin-block
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position and the container in the block direction

S.name: scroll-margin-block-end
S.brief: Specifies the end margin between the snap position and the container in the block direction

S.name: scroll-margin-block-start
S.brief: Specifies the start margin between the snap position and the container in the block direction

S.name: scroll-margin-bottom
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the bottom side and the container

S.name: scroll-margin-inline
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position and the container in the inline direction

S.name: scroll-margin-inline-end
S.brief: Specifies the end margin between the snap position and the container in the inline direction

S.name: scroll-margin-inline-start
S.brief: Specifies the start margin between the snap position and the container in the inline direction

S.name: scroll-margin-left
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the left side and the container

S.name: scroll-margin-right
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the right side and the container

S.name: scroll-margin-top
S.brief: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the top side and the container

S.name: scroll-padding
S.brief: Specifies the distance from the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-block
S.brief: Specifies the distance in block direction from the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-block-end
S.brief: Specifies the distance in block direction from the end of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-block-start
S.brief: Specifies the distance in block direction from the start of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-bottom
S.brief: Specifies the distance from the bottom of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-inline
S.brief: Specifies the distance in inline direction from the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-inline-end
S.brief: Specifies the distance in inline direction from the end of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-inline-start
S.brief: Specifies the distance in inline direction from the start of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-left
S.brief: Specifies the distance from the left side of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-right
S.brief: Specifies the distance from the right side of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-padding-top
S.brief: Specifies the distance from the top of the container to the snap position on the child elements

S.name: scroll-snap-align
S.brief: Specifies where to position elements when the user stops scrolling

S.name: scroll-snap-stop
S.brief: Specifies scroll behaviour after fast swipe on trackpad or touch screen

S.name: scroll-snap-type
S.brief: Specifies how snap behaviour should be when scrolling

S.name: scrollbar-color
S.brief: Specifies the color of the scrollbar of an element

S.name: shape-outside
S.brief: Defines a shape for wrapping for the inline content

T.name: tab-size
T.brief: Specifies the width of a tab character

T.name: table-layout
T.brief: Defines the algorithm used to lay out table cells, rows, and columns

T.name: text-align
T.brief: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

T.name: text-align-last
T.brief: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is "justify"

T.name: text-decoration
T.brief: Specifies the decoration added to text

T.name: text-decoration-color
T.brief: Specifies the color of the text-decoration

T.name: text-decoration-line
T.brief: Specifies the type of line in a text-decoration

T.name: text-decoration-style
T.brief: Specifies the style of the line in a text decoration

T.name: text-decoration-thickness
T.brief: Specifies the thickness of the decoration line

T.name: text-emphasis
T.brief:
A shorthand property for the text-emphasis-style and 
    text-emphasis-color properties

T.name: text-emphasis-color
T.brief: Specifies the color of emphasis marks

T.name: text-emphasis-position
T.brief: Specifies the position of emphasis marks

T.name: text-emphasis-style
T.brief: Specifies the style of emphasis marks

T.name: text-indent
T.brief: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block

T.name: text-justify
T.brief: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is "justify"

T.name: text-orientation
T.brief: Defines the orientation of characters in a line

T.name: text-overflow
T.brief: Specifies what should happen when text overflows the containing element

T.name: text-shadow
T.brief: Adds shadow to text

T.name: text-transform
T.brief: Controls the capitalization of text

T.name: text-underline-offset
T.brief: Specifies the offset distance of the underline text decoration

T.name: text-underline-position
T.brief: Specifies the position of the underline text decoration

T.name: top
T.brief: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

T.name: transform
T.brief: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element

T.name: transform-origin
T.brief: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements

T.name: transform-style
T.brief: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space

T.name: transition
T.brief: A shorthand property for all the transition-* properties

T.name: transition-delay
T.brief: Specifies when the transition effect will start

T.name: transition-duration
T.brief: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete

T.name: transition-property
T.brief: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for

T.name: transition-timing-function
T.brief: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect

T.name: translate
T.brief: Specifies the position of an element

U.name: unicode-bidi
U.brief: Used together with the direction property to set or return whether the text should be overridden to support multiple languages in the same document

U.name: user-select
U.brief: Specifies whether the text of an element can be selected

V.name: vertical-align
V.brief: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

V.name: visibility
V.brief: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

W.name: white-space
W.brief: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

W.name: widows
W.brief:
Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the top of a page 
    or column

W.name: width
W.brief: Sets the width of an element

W.name: word-break
W.brief: Specifies how words should break when reaching the end of a line

W.name: word-spacing
W.brief: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text

W.name: word-wrap
W.brief: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line

W.name: writing-mode
W.brief: Specifies whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically

Z.name: z-index
Z.brief: Sets the stack order of a positioned element

Z.name: zoom
Z.brief: Specifies the zoom factor for an element. An element can be zoomed in and out
